results.title: The role of sodium lauryl sulfate on formulation of directly compressed tablets containing simvastatin and aspirin: Effect on drugs dissolution and gastric mucosa
results.text_hl: As mentioned previously, the long-term oral administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ and ASA, as poorly @CHEMICAL_Water @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014867 @@@water@@@-soluble and weakly acidic drugs, can cause @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal irritation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin as a novel therapeutic agent for venous ulcers: a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Among @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcers@@@ > 5 cm, 67% closed in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group, with a mean healing time of 9 17 +- 1 07 weeks.

results.title: Dodecenylsuccinic anhydride modified collagen hydrogels loaded with simvastatin as skin wound dressings.
results.text_hl: Herein, we developed a hydrophobic wound dressing to incorporate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which has potential application in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcers@@@ and prevention of @DISEASE_Wound_Infection @DISEASE_MESH:D014946 @@@wound infection@@@.

results.title: Gastric antisecretory and antiulcer effects of simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: This investigation aimed to study the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ on experimentally induced @DISEASE_Stomach_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D013272 @@@gastric@@@ acid secretion and @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@ formation.

results.title: Effects of statins in an indomethacin-induced gastric injury model in rats.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@ indexes were as follows: control 1.72 +- 0.16, @CHEMICAL_Omeprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009853 @@@omeprazole@@@ 0 +- 0.00, and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (at 20 and 40 mg/kg doses, respectively) 4.28 +- 0.39, 4.99 +- 0.96, 1.72 +- 0.73, 1.90 +- 0.48, 1.85 +- 0.26, and 1.67 +- 0.18.

results.title: PURLs: A new adjunctive Tx option for venous stasis ulcers.
results.text_hl: ...Adding @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to standard wound care improves @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@ healing rates and times as well as the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s quality of life.

results.title: Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins.
results.text_hl: Results confirm a gastroprotective effect for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and indicate that the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is mediated by scavenging @CHEMICAL_Free_Radicals @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005609 @@@free radicals@@@, increasing @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dinoprostone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015232 @@@prostaglandin E(2)@@@ levels, and increasing gastric juice @GENE_SLC13A2 @GENE_65202 @@@mucin@@@ production.

citations.NLM: Heeba GH, Hassan MK, Amin RS. Gastroprotective effect of simvastatin against indomethacin-induced gastric ulcer in rats: role of nitric oxide and prostaglandins. Eur J Pharmacol. 2009 Apr 1;607(1-3):188-93. PMID: 19217901

results.title: Role of modulation of vascular endothelial growth factor and tumor necrosis factor-alpha in gastric ulcer healing in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: Our results suggest the feasibility of a novel treatment strategy, namely @CHEMICAL_Pentoxifylline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010431 @@@pentoxifylline@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in whom impairment of @<m>DISEASE_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcer@@@ healing constitutes a secondary complication of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@.
